about_the_game:
The game is in full swing. It's going well. But here's a shooting chance! The opponent is already at your side of the field and he is determined to win. And... Goal saved!
It's always easy to move forward when you know that you have such a stone rear. And with it you'll not catch cold! You can go to the enemy without worrying about anything. The greatest goalkeeper will save a goal! And the dice, 100 gold and 50.000 chips will cheer you up.

After buying this content, you get to your collection of characters "Goalkeeper", "Goalkeeper's dice", as well as 100 gold and 50,000 chips.
